name: New Ball Shoot Panda
description:
New Ball Shoot Panda is a fantastic game for you, light entertainment game suit everyone after hours of studying stress.you will be involved in pet rescue journey with mother bear cub panda to rescue trapped in colorful balls. Come join us and discover even play offline.
Features:
1. Classic game with save panda mode
2. Lots of boosters to enjoy.
3. Design for mobile.
4.Play Free! No Network Required!
5.Fluent shooting experience!
